sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>machine</radical> in your body that is powered by the <radical>moon</radical> is your <kanji>womb</kanji>, also called your <kanji>uterus</kanji>! Haven't you ever wondered why periods happen with the revolutions of the moon? That's because it powers your uterus and tells it what to do!
meaningInfo: The next time you're cursing your uterus for making you bleed, curse the moon instead! It's the moon's fault you're in pain.
readingMnemonic: It kind of sucks, but there is no way to sever this <kanji>uterus</kanji> - moon <reading>tie</reading> (<ja>たい</ja>). But if you find a way please tell me, I can't take this anymore.
readingInfo: Picture an invisible tie tieing your uterus to the moon. Damn you moon, stop pulling, it hurts!
